fr:frontmatter.fr:title: A connectivity toolbox
fr:frontmatter.fr:meta: Atlantic Meeting on Topology, Representation theory, and K-theory (AMTRaK): Homological Stability

fr:mainmatter.fr:p: This talk will elaborate on the connectivity arguments that were swept under the rug during pre-talk 1. In particular, we will focus on tools and techniques coming from discrete Morse theory. After introducing the basics of discrete Morse theory, we will use it to prove the Solomon-Tits Theorem.
